## `SortGraph`

Sorts the bars in the specified bar chart.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SortGraph(GraphType type,
          SortOrder order)
```


### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| [`GraphType`](#graphtype) type | The bar chart to sort. | 
| [`SortOrder`](#sortorder) order | How the bars should be sorted. |
:::
